title: Exercise: Build Dynamic Workflows with the SchemaScanner

questions.question: What happens if this workspace runs on a CSV that does not contain the attribute Close?
options: The workspace will fail with an error in the AttributeManager.
The workspace will run successfully with the same output as the current exercise.
The workspace will fail with an error in the writer.
The workspace will run successfully, but the value for the attribute Hours will be incorrect.

questions.question: What happens if this workspace runs on a CSV that contains new attributes Lat and Long that are not defined on the reader Feature Type?
options: The reader will not read them.
The writer will not write them.
The writer will include them in the output, unmodified.
The writer will include them in the output, but will truncate their length to 22.
